SUITE.NAME: All in main lib Coverage Results

task.summary: Default task
added the elevator car class
added time scaling
lots of refactoring
lots of refactoring of the avatar movement code, fixed a few bugs with the elevator car and passenger prioritization.
lots of refactoring of the avatar movement code, fixed a few bugs with the elevator car and passenger prioritization.
lots of refactoring of the avatar movement code, fixed a few bugs with the elevator car and passenger prioritization.
cleaned up some hud elements which were using screen height/width rather than gui stage height/width.
started working on radial menus
some more art from miller, and the start to a new HUD.
added transit purchase menu
switched to ogl es 2.0 and updated libgdx
began splitting out the HUD into diff components.
began splitting out the HUD into diff components.
began working on janitors!
janitors now janitate commercial spaces!
janitors now janitate commercial spaces!
maids clean shit too
Achievement engine works!
Achievement engine now handles unlock rewards!
achievement notifications
cleaned up some code and added some tests for ui elements
cleaned up some code and added some tests for ui elements
cleaned up some code and added some tests for ui elements
fixed camera bounds checking, added city scape background!
moved the rain into its own layer so the clouds would be on top.
weather service is starting
weather service now changes weather every minute, fixed stair movement, added wander ability to avatars.
fixed a few bugs found by sarah
* NullPointerException when dragging stuff to the bottom of the world (Sarah) * Avatars wouldn't move, they were lazy and indecisive. * Upgraded all third party libs in prep for Facebook connect.
api is more stable, have a weird integer conversion problem.
apis are more resilient.
added new art for the burger joint.
grid will now automatically resize as the tower grows upwards, there are also now buttons for the user to expand land left or right.
increased the number of avatars for desktop builds only. fixed a bug where lobbies could exist above level 4. game grid automatically grows taller as needed.
Everything works after that massive refactor now.
extracted some constants removed rhino
upgraded universal tween engine added object counts to game save as some metadata changed speed of rain.
added a shim to the desktop app so i could intercept the state of window focus fixed a few missing function calls in the input system added action manager
more of the main menu
new game starts a game, but does not set it up properly yet.

removed a bunch more singletons and statics throughout the codebase. game grid no longer can use custom unit sizes. new art from alex for: sushi, bar, pizza place city scape later now cycles through the regions available rather than randomly choose.
all api requests now work perfectly!
loading and saving games works, along with pngs!
load game window is a bit nicer.
cleaned up the UI a bit.
moved the connect to happy droids window to the main menu now
fixed the font rounding errors
fixed alignment in grid object purchase menu
updated gdx and added the ability to force cloud saves
switched to using the asset manager for all assets. added platform specific clases for uncaught exceptions and browser utils
removed an errant runtime exception that blew up the game.
removed debug keybindings added close button to connect window added cousin vinnie
removed debug keybindings added close button to connect window added cousin vinnie

moved a bunch of code out to happydroids-common so it can be shared amongst the other projects easily
renamed all the packages, should write a migration for old game files.
added the game update checker to sparky
game update checker can now handle releases without a patch, the full download will then be used.
sparky mostly works now!
added clickable libgdx logo to the main menu
upgraded the achievements engine quite a bit, much more robust now! merged all the avatars into a single image wrote some migration code that could work lol
achievements is much much more robust now everything has a provider type, got rid of the notion of isLobby too!
fixed a bug in GameSave where newGame was never set to false!
